en: Welcome to Location Insolite , a charming interlude in the heart of the Ardennes . Discover our romantic accommodation: a Love Room with private spa in Bogny-sur-Meuse . An experience for two Treat yourself to a unique interlude in a 100?m¬≤ cocoon: whirlpool spa, subdued atmosphere, king-size bed, fully-equipped kitchen, Netflix? Every detail is designed to celebrate love and create unforgettable memories... ? Discover the Love Room La Cr√®che Romantique ? We've thought of everything for your comfort. By booking direct, take advantage of our best rates and a 15% weekday discount for stays of 2 nights or more. Location Insolite ? Exceptional accommodation for couples in search of well-being, magic and intimacy in the Ardennes...? They loved their stay "Love room more than pleasant, pretty and clean. Lovely little touches on arrival. Thank you very much, we'll be happy to recommend you. See you soon"? Airbnb - July 2025 "A pleasant stay, a very friendly and flexible welcome. Very clean accommodation, with even small cold drinks and a welcome aperitif cookie. The accommodation is as per the photos and lacks nothing. We will return :)" ?
